wikipedia_page.main: Paul David Emson (born 22 October 1958) is an English former footballer who scored 38 goals from 321 appearances in the Football League playing on the left wing for Derby County, Grimsby Town, Wrexham and Darlington. He began his football career in the Grimsby & District League before moving into senior non-league football with Brigg Town, and later played in the Conference for Kettering Town and Gateshead.
